text: The San Jose Stealth are a lacrosse team based in San Jose, California. The team plays in the National Lacrosse League (NLL). The 2008 season was the 9th in franchise history and 5th as the Stealth (previously the Albany Attack). ==Regular season== ===Conference standings=== ===Game log=== Reference: ==Playoffs== ===Game log=== Reference: ==Player stats== Reference:http://pointstreak.com/prostats/teamplayerstats.html?teamid=25954&seasonid;=1995 ===Runners (Top 10)=== Note: GP = Games played; G = Goals; A = Assists; Pts = Points; LB = Loose Balls; PIM = Penalty Minutes {| class="wikitable sortable" |- align=center !
